experience.description: Data Engineer at FedEx Advanced Capability Community. Part of team involved in development of HS(Harmonized Search) code search engine. I worked on Normalization (Hierarchical data handling) and Tokenization modules in the pipeline. Worked on code optimization and reducing the time complexity. Tech stack: Python, NLP, SQL and Abinitio

At Persistent Systems I was an AI & ML intern. I worked on building automated duplicate/ similar question suggestion Transformer and developed a chatbot using Transformer to summarize and answer specific questions related to policies of the company on the community portal. Tech stack: Python, Tensorflow, Keras, Transformer, Flask, FAST API and Docker
At NICE I was a Data Intern. I built a real-time file based ingestion system to process and store data in real-time. Tech stack: Python, HTML, CSS, JS, AWS(S3, DynamoDB, Lambda), Flask and MongoDB

projects.title: Real-time Phishing Website Detection
projects.description: Implemented models to detect phishing websites in real-time. Implemented two machine learning models, Logistic Regression and Neural Network, to detect phishing websites in real-time with Edge browser extension: https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/mr-phish/cfleogjiegdfbapbmindbpeebncpmbhf. Published a paper: https://www.ijrte.org/portfolio-item/a76080512123/.

projects.title: Real-time Object Detection
projects.description: Implemented real-time object detection model. Code Repository: https://github.com/Mit-byte/PBL-2-Project

projects.title: Surface Crack Detection
projects.description: Applied Convolutional Neural Network and Quantum Neural Network to detect surface cracks on image dataset and compared the results. Code Repository: https://github.com/iotaisolutions/hackathon-submission

projects.title: Quantum Steganography Protocol
projects.description: Implemented a quantum steganography protocol for encrypting text data using Qiskit. Code Repository: https://github.com/Mit-byte/quantum-steganography

projects.title: Data Analysis on Student Performance
projects.description: Performing real world data analysis of student performance in 3 courses. Comparing results of classical ML models(like Logistic regression and Gaussian Naive Bayes), QSVM(Quantum Support Vector Machine) and VQC(Variational Quantum Classifier). Dataset provided by Prof. Manjula Gandhi. Code Repository: https://github.com/Mit-byte/Data-analysis-on-Student-Performance-Dataset

projects.title: Breast Cancer Detection Web Application
projects.description: Developed an application for detecting breast cancer. Code Repository: https://github.com/Mit-byte/Breast-Cancer-Detection-using-CNN

featured talks.title: Quantum Cryptography with Python coding and Qiskit
Qiskit 101 live demo at Qiskit Fall Fest 2021
Real world data analysis using Quantum and Classical ML algorithms
